events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle in downtown traffic during rush hour, requesting to file a claim immediately.
Claim categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing details about the car collision from the initial report submitted.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the case involving the customer’s vehicle accident for further processing.
Acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming the receipt and registration of the auto accident claim for their vehicle.
Requesting police report, photos of damages, and the vehicle registration documents to proceed with investigation of the accident.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report and pictures showing damage caused by the collision.
Investigation has commenced focusing on liability assessment and damage evaluation related to the vehicle collision incident.
Investigation concluded after verifying all submitted evidence and determining the extent of damage to the customer’s car.
Settlement plan proposed to the customer covering repair costs and compensation for the damage to their vehicle.
Customer provided positive feedback expressing satisfaction with the clear and fast settlement proposal for the car accident.
Final approval given for the vehicle damage claim enabling the next step of disbursing the settlement payment to the customer.
Insurance payment successfully issued covering authorized repair costs as agreed in the approved settlement proposal.
Claim officially closed after confirmation the payment was received and repairs on the vehicle have been completed.
